name: Retro Snake (itch) (Youssef Derbel)
description:
Retro Snake is simple classic game with 8 bit cyberpunk theme and cool Matrix  background , this is just fan made game I did make to learn javascript and HTML don't take it too serious just enjoy 
PS: I am aware of the scaling problem , it's caused by itch.io full screen Embed option , the scaling works just fine when I launch the game locally on my computer .. will contact them to find fix for this soon
